metadata.title: CVE-2023-27539 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Possible Denial of Service Vulnerability in Rackâ€™s header parsing

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-27539` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ruby-rack - 2.0.7-2ubuntu0.1+esm4
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: ruby-rack package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.0.7-2ubuntu0.1+esm4').
